settings.title: Settings
settings.resetSubtitle: Clear all data and start over
settings.resetConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to reset all your personal information? This will restart the app setup process.
settings.resetSuccess: Your data has been reset. You will now be redirected to the onboarding screen.
settings.resetError: Failed to reset data. Please try again.
settings.notificationSubtitle: Test push notifications on this device
settings.missionText: Gym Buddy is your personal fitness and nutrition companion, designed to help you achieve your health goals through intelligent meal planning and exercise tracking.
settings.featuresText:
‚Ä¢ Personalized calorie and macro tracking
‚Ä¢ AI-powered meal plan generation
‚Ä¢ Exercise form analysis with AI
‚Ä¢ Daily water intake tracking
‚Ä¢ Progress monitoring and insights
settings.teamText: Developed with passion by a team dedicated to making fitness and nutrition accessible to everyone. We combine cutting-edge AI technology with proven nutritional science to deliver a comprehensive health platform.
settings.contactText:
Have questions or feedback? We'd love to hear from you!

Email: support@gymbuddy.app
Website: www.gymbuddy.app
settings.acknowledgmentsText: Thank you for choosing Gym Buddy as your fitness companion. Your health journey is our priority, and we're committed to supporting you every step of the way.

quotes.q1: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, sacrifice, and most of all, love of what you are doing.
quotes.q2: The secret of success is to do the common things uncommonly well.
quotes.q3: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.q4: Whether you think you can or you think you can't, you're right.
quotes.q5: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.q6: Opportunities are usually disguised as hard work, so most people don't recognize them.
quotes.q7: Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift.
quotes.q8: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.q9: The most important thing in life is to learn from your failures.
quotes.q10: Weak people revenge. Strong people forgive. Intelligent people ignore.
quotes.q11: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.q12: It always seems impossible until it's done.
quotes.q13: Never give up. Today's struggles are tomorrow's strengths.
quotes.q14: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.q15: Nothing is impossible. The word itself says 'I'm possible'.
quotes.q16: Falling down is not failure. Refusing to get up is failure.
quotes.q17: If you don't have dreams, you'll never have reality.
quotes.q18: Believe in yourself and you've won half the race.
quotes.q19: Success happens when preparation meets opportunity.
quotes.q20: Hard times create strong men, strong men create easy times.
quotes.q21: Do the thing you think you cannot do.
quotes.q22: Excellence is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.q23: What you don't want to do today, you'll have to do tomorrow.
quotes.q24: Successful people do what they are afraid of.
quotes.q25: Remember that every master was once a beginner.
quotes.q26: Obstacles are those frightful things you see when you take your eyes off your goal.
quotes.q27: Don't rush on the road to success, because a slower pace means fewer mistakes.
quotes.q28: Learn to dance in the storm, and you'll applaud when the rain stops.
quotes.q29: Trying is not failure, never trying is failure.
quotes.q30: Setting big goals and taking action to reach them is a way of life.
quotes.q31: Failure is just part of the journey to success.
quotes.q32: If you have a dream, you must protect it.
quotes.q33: The difficult is right, the easy is wrong.
quotes.q34: Discipline is the key to freedom to do what you want.
quotes.q35: Real change begins in the discomfort zone.
quotes.q36: Life is about overcoming unexpected challenges.
quotes.q37: Nothing tastes as good as success when you've conquered your doubts.
quotes.q38: Be the author of your own story.
quotes.q39: Today is hard, tomorrow is harder, but the day after tomorrow is sunny.
quotes.q40: After the darkest night comes the brightest dawn.
quotes.q41: Taking control of your life means using your courage.
quotes.q42: Success is sacrificing what you want for what you want most.
quotes.q43: Stay awake to make your dreams come true.
quotes.q45: Nothing happens unless you use your potential.
quotes.q46: Awareness is the first step to change.
quotes.q47: The day you don't renew yourself is the day you fall behind.
quotes.q48: Dreaming alone is not enough, you must take action.
quotes.q49: Failure is a reason to try a new strategy.
quotes.q50: You can achieve anything you believe in.
quotes.q51: Perseverance makes the impossible possible, the possible probable, and the probable certain.
quotes.q52: Consistency is the most important component of success.
quotes.q53: Instead of doing everything once, do one thing a thousand times.
quotes.q54: Strength does not come from physical capacity, but from indomitable will.
quotes.q56: The greatest victory is never giving up.
quotes.q57: Take one step, then another. That's how the journey is completed.
quotes.q58: Success is measured by how many times you get up when you fall.
quotes.q59: Patience may be bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.q60: Victory belongs to the most persevering.
quotes.q62: Go a little further every day.
quotes.q63: I didn't sleep for thousands of nights, not just one.
quotes.q64: It's not those who fall who lose, but those who can't get up.
quotes.q65: Success is the ability to get up after falling.
quotes.q66: Great things start with small steps.
quotes.q69: Change can be hard, but staying the same destroys you.
quotes.q71: What is easily gained is easily lost.
quotes.q72: Persistence is the strongest weapon of success.
quotes.q73: Failure is an opportunity to try again.
quotes.q74: To reach your goal, you must first see yourself reaching it.
quotes.q76: Success is a marathon, not a sprint.
quotes.q77: Every failure is one step closer to success.
quotes.q78: Character is revealed in difficult times.
quotes.q79: Your faith makes you fight, your perseverance makes you win.
quotes.q80: Nothing can stop a determined mind.
quotes.q81: Great things are born from long-term thinking.
quotes.q82: Success is a combination of patience and determination.
quotes.q83: Victory comes one minute before you give up.
quotes.q84: Get a little better every day, a little stronger every day.
quotes.q85: Patience is the greatest of all virtues.
quotes.q86: Great work comes from the continuity of small work.
quotes.q87: Everything comes with practice, even genius.
quotes.q88: Determination can defeat even a lack of talent.
quotes.q89: The impossible is completed today, miracles take a little longer.
quotes.q90: Conditions will never be perfect. Start now.
quotes.q91: Failure is only temporary. Giving up makes it permanent.
quotes.q92: Learn a little more every day, grow a little more.

quotes.q94: Consistency is as powerful as genius.

quotes.q96: You are born again every morning. What you do is up to you.

quotes.q98: Trees with deep roots are not afraid of the strongest storms.

quotes.q101: Discipline is the bridge between who you are and who you want to be.
quotes.q102: Discipline is painful, but its reward is endless.
